meanings.definition: A type of cotton fabric with vertical ribs
meanings.sent1: I love the soft feel of corduroys against my skin.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pair of corduroys to stay warm in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up on the pile of corduroys, mistaking them for a cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: The rows of corduroys in the fabric store stood tall like soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: The rich brown color of the corduroys reminded me of a chocolate bar.

meanings.sent1: My dad prefers to wear corduroys when he goes fishing.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of corduroys for the autumn season.
meanings.sent3: The corduroys were so comfortable that he fell asleep in them on the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her corduroys whispered softly as she walked through the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The corduroys hugged his legs snugly, keeping him warm on the chilly evening.
